body: Is that the chikan trap of my dream? Definitly yes, the art looks pretty great the boy is cute without being stupidly girly (yeah 'cause sometime traps are just way too girly it's just futa without boobs) the only thing is that the sex scene a the end was a bit short.
The screentone pattern on the clothes bothers me so much. The artist is lazy.
I want a "Train" tag to be a thing, please. x3
some gaytards with a feminine counterpart want to be raped on a crowded place? COUNT ME IN!

had good potential and isn't bad, the art while the fucking is happening could be better though
